ygData.subject: /conning creatures
ygData.msgSnippet: ... /Con colors are purely level dependent.  Creatures 4+ levels below will con green, 1-3 levels below will con blue, equals will con white/black, 1-3 above
ygData.messageBody:
>

/Con colors are purely level dependent. Creatures 4+ levels below will con
green, 1-3 levels below will con blue, equals will con white/black, 1-3 above
are yellow, and 4+ are red. The text associated with the con will give the
relative difficulty with the fight although they are still a bit misleading
and to general for my taste.

>
>
> You know, this is kind of disturbing. If level 30+ blue creatures can kick
> the stuffin' out of you almost every time... why do they still con blue?
> Shouldn't they be conned yellow or red?
>
> Are the con colors a straight, level-wise calculation (L15 vs L15 =
> white/black),
> or a probability of success calculation (L15 vs L15, but the player is low
> on HP = yellow)?
>
> Of course, I'll not see level 30+ critters as anything but red for a long
> long time. =)
>
> -Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe
>
